name: Roman Belavkin
content: Roman Belavkin Roman Belavkin Contact Addess: School of Science and Technology Middlesex University The Burroughs London NW4 4BT England Phone:+44 (0)20 8411 6263 Fax:+44 (0)20 8411 6943 E.mail:R...B.e.l.a.v.k.i.n.@.m.d.x...a.c...u.k Reader in Informatics, School of Science and Technology, Middlesex University Affiliated faculty of Center for Applied Optimization, University of Florida Editorial board member of Optimization Letters 1998-2002 PhD in Computer Science, The University of Nottingham. 1988-1994 MSc in Physics, Moscow State University. New paper: Monotonicity of Fitness Landscapes and Mutation Rate Control. Journal of Mathematical Biology. Upcoming talks: 2018, July 22 Talk at Advanced Course on Data Science & Machine Learning.
